amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 117-273 to strike the carve out for unions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the carve out for unions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 246 (Roll no. 79).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Fitzgerald.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 246 (Roll no. 79).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 246 (Roll no. 79).
